headline: Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) Earnings Double In 2024 Forecast
summary: Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) has made headlines with its recent events, which include a significant acquisition of a leading U.S. defense business and the announcement of strong earnings for 2024, with net income more than doubling from 2023. These developments underpin the company's 12% share price increase over the last quarter. Additionally, their ongoing share buyback program and dividend affirmation reflect the company's focus on shareholder value. During this period of market volatility,...

headline: Northrop Grumman : New Air and Missile Defense Integration Center Expands Manufacturing Capacity in Alabama
summary: HUNTSVILLE, Ala. - April 14, 2025 - Northrop Grumman Corporation has opened a new state-of-the-art integration center in Madison, Alabama, in support of the United States Army's accelerated...
